Body:
"""Ensure appropriate error for author ORCID not matching that via DOI
        """
authors = [{'name': 'Kyle E Niemeyer', 'ORCID': '0000-0003-0815-9270'}, {
    'name': 'Kyle Brady', 'ORCID': '0000-0002-4664-3680'}, {'name':
    'Chih-Jen Sung'}, {'name': 'Xin Hui'}]
v.validate({'reference': {'authors': authors, 'doi':
    '10.1016/j.combustflame.2015.06.017'}}, update=True)
assert 'Kyle E Niemeyer ORCID does not match that in reference. Reference: 0000-0003-4425-7097. Given: ' + authors[
    0]['ORCID'] in v.errors['reference']
internet_missing
